comments.body:
But this is the order we use when generated. I think it helps readability if the order is aligned.
(Same for the previous remark where you wanted notes higher up, that should be reflected in the template)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@- Locates and consolidates fragmented files on local volumes to improve system performance.
- 'More information regarding C(win_defrag) is available from: U(https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc731650(v=ws.11).aspx)'
requirements:
- defrag.exe
